# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product which has been valued at $1000000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to own this product at an extraordinary price of $850000. This is an excellent chance to secure a significant saving while acquiring an item of great value. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
